snippet: The Bronx Zoo on Monday shut down its 111-year-old Monkey House, an attraction that had long been a popular throwback to zoos of an earlier age.
abstract: Bronx Zoo shuts down its 111-year-old Monkey House, an attraction that had long been a popular throwback to zoos of an earlier age; most of its animals will be moved to other areas of the zoo in more naturalistic exhibition areas.
lead_paragraph: The Bronx Zoo on Monday shut down its 111-year-old Monkey House, an attraction that had long been a popular throwback to zoos of an earlier age.

headline.seo: The Monkey House Ends a 111-Year Run in the Bronx
headline.main: The Monkey House Ends a 111-Year Run in the Bronx, a Victim of Zoo Evolution
headline.print_headline: Monkey House Closes After 111 Years in Bronx, a Victim of Zoo Evolution
